extension.name: OS Property Tag Cloud
extension.author: Ossolution
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Ossolution team. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This module displays an automatically generated tag cloud from the content on your OS Property Property data.

field.name: minsize
field.label: Min Font Size (px)
field.description: The size of the smallest element in the list of tags in pixels. Default 10.

field.name: maxsize
field.label: Max Font Size (px)
field.description: The size of the largest element in the list of tags in pixels. Default 25.

field.name: tagcount
field.label: Word Count
field.description: The amount of words you would like to show in your tag cloud. Default 25.

field.name: limit
field.label: Property Limit
field.description: If you have hundreds of properties, you probably want to limit the results being queried. Default 10.

field.name: excludelist
field.label: Excluded Words
field.description: Write here words you would like to not be displayed in your tag cloud. (plurals will be excluded automatically, as will any word shorter than 3 chars.)
